typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SurveyTransaction
source(output(
		Number as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select Number, Name from Customers',
	format: 'query') ~> Customers
SurveyTransaction, Customers join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinToCustomer
JoinToCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToData
